shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” (fols. 4ra-132vb) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 4ra-5vb, 8ra-9ra) I-2) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 9ra-11rb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki... “I worship Thee...” (fols. 6ra, 11rb-vb) I-4a) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary”: 85 miracles (fols. 6ra-7vb, 12ra-116ra) I-4b) Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary”: 11 miracles (fols. 117ra-132vb)
Additiones 1-2.

copyists.copyist: ʿAśratä Maryam (hand a) is mentioned as the scribe in the concluding supplication on fol. 115vb.

donors.donor: The following persons are mentioned as commissioners in the concluding supplication on fol. 115vb and in the supplication formulas of Texts I-1 to I-4a (hand a): Zä-Wäldä Maryam, ʾAmmǝḫa Giyorgis, Täklä Haymanot, Wäldä Kiros, Gäbrä ʾEwosṭatewos; also written over erasure on fols. 56rb, 76ra, 89rb. In addition, the names of ʾAmonyos (e.g., fols. 22ra, 47ra), Wäldä ʾArdǝʾǝt (e.g., fols. 45va, 47ra) and ʿAḍfä Krǝstos (e.g., fols. 54ra, 100ra) are given. Täklä Haymanot is mentioned also in supplication formulas of Text I-4b (in hand b).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. was resewn. Fols. 6r-7v were misplaced. Originally, fols. 8r-11v (quire II) were placed between fols. 5r-6v (quire I). The leather cover is partly detached from the back board; it has been cut off from the spine, probably to facilitate the resewing. The lower corner of fol. 93 is cut off. Holes or tears carefully amended on fols. 1, 3, 47, 73, 84, 86, 87, 104, 130. Fols. 1 and 3 are of different size and lighter colour.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather (half cover). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 2 tools were used: single line fillet, double circle).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub before 2/fols. 1r-3v) – I(4/fols. 4r-7v) – II(4/fols. 8r-11v) – ፪III፪(8/fols. 12r-19v) – ፫IV፫(8/fols. 20r-27v) – ፬V፬(8/fols. 28r-35v) – ፭VI፭(8/fols. 36r-43v) – ፮VII፮(8/fols. 44r-51v) – ፯VIII፯(8/fols. 52r-59v) – ፰IX፰(8/fols. 60r-67v) – ፱X፱(8/fols. 68r-75v) – ፲XI፲(8/fols. 76r-83v) – ፲፩XII፲፩(8/fols. 84r-91v) – ፲፪XIII፲፪ (8/fols. 92r-99v) – ፲፫XIV፲፫(6/fols. 100r-107v) – ፲፬XV(9; s.l.: 1, stub after 9/fols. 108r-116v) –XVI(8/fols. 117r-124v) – XVII(8/fols. 125r-132v) – B(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 2/fols. 133r-135v)

taunit.mr-info: Quires I-XV: all data for fol. 5r.
taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling (sometimes below the ruling, e.g., fols. 30v, 34v).
The ruling has been done crudely. Some leaves have one additional top ruled line not used by the scribe (fols. 4r-6v, 9r-10v, 12rv, 14rv, 19r-20v etc.). Many leaves have one (fols. 15r-17r, 19rv, 28rv, 31r-32v, 35rv etc.), some two (fols. 29rv, 34rv etc.) additional bottom ruled line not used by the scribe.

taunit.mr-info: Quires XVI-XVII: all data for fol. 120r.
taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The ruling has been done crudely. Some leaves have an additional bottom ruled line not used by the scribe (fols. 118r-119v, 120v-123r, 124r).

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: mediocre. Hand b: poor, irregular.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a, ʿAśratä Maryam (quires I-VX): the handwriting appears careful at the beginning and becomes more irregular from fol. 47r onwards (cp. fols. 3rb vs. 51rb), partly due to the poor ruling. Hand b (quires XVI-XVII): left-sloping letters.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra (Maryam and Mariham); name of the Archangel Mikaʾel (fols. 11ra, 129rav); names of the commissioner and his family members; the word sälam "salutation" in Texts I-1 and I-3; directives for the ministers in Text I-1; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
Several groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I (alternating with black lines), a few lines in the incipit of Text I-2 (alternating with black lines), initial line in the incipit of Texts I-3 and I-4, one or a few words of subsections of Texts I-1 and I-2, two initial lines of sections of Text I-4) and some subsection numbers (Text I-4a).

abbreviations.abbreviation: ሰላ፡ for ሰላም፡ (fol. 8va-vb) ሕ፡ for ይበል፡ ሕዝብ፡ (fol. 9ra) ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡ (fol. 9ra)

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1, partly with interlineal musical notation (fol. 8ra-vb), contains: - Ṣälotä [zä-yǝbǝl] ʾǝmqǝdmä [yanbǝbu] täʾamǝr lä-ʾәgzǝʾtǝnä Maryam... “Prayer [recited] before [reading] the Miracles ...” (fol. 9ra). It also contains indications for the reading of an excerpt from the Gospel of John (Jn. 19:25-27) (fol. 9ra) and the hymn Sälam lä-Maryam “Salutation for Mary” (fol. 9ra). Further indications for reading the Miracles of Mary are written in the upper margin of fols. 7v and 10v.
Text I-2 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam wäladitä ʾamlak ... “O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Godbearing ...” (fol. 10ra l.12-va) - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... “O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ...” (fol. 10va) (cp. ChRep no. 373) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... “Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ...” (fols. 10vb-11rb).
The miracles of St. Mary in Text I-4a are numbered (from miracle 37 onwards by the same hand that wrote Additio 2). Two miracles of Text I-4a are followed by a hymn. - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam ʾǝm-betä mängǝśt wä-ʾǝm-betä kahǝnät... “O my Lady Mary, from the house of Kingdom and the house of Priesthood…” (fol. 7rb l. 9) - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam mälakotawit piläs zä-adḫǝnkiyo ʾǝm-kwǝnäne lä-aḥadu-mänäkos ... "O my Lady Mary, Divine Temple …" (fol. 17va-vb)
Text I-4a concludes with an extended supplication for the commissioners (subscriptio, fol. 115vb).

additional.cont: Fol. 2ra-va: Excerpt from Mäṣḥafä śərˁat, Introductory rite of al-Muˁallaqah.
additional.det: The excerpt is followed by a note on commissioning the writing in the same hand. It mentions the “children of ʾAmdä Mikaʾel” as commissioners. The initial two lines of the excerpt and the name of Mary are rubricated.

additional.cont: Fol. 116rb: Excommunication against those who stole the book or erased its text.
additional.det: The note is followed by an exhortation.

extras.extra: - Fol. 134 contains the beginning of Text I-1 written in the main hand, probably a production error. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally: fols. 4rb, 6ra, 8rb, 26vb, 37va, 50va, 53rb, 58vb, 118rb, 119va, 121ra, 127va. - Tämälläs-signs (in the shape of +) indicating the place where the omissions, written interlineally (fol.10ra) or in the margins (fols. 9vb, 23rb, 63vb, 81va, 93vb, 96vba), belong. - Erasures are marked with crude lines: fols. 49vab, 58ra, 63rb, 104vb; with fine red lines: e.g., fols. 127ra, 128ra. - Erasures without marking: fols. 109ra, 121vb, 123va. - Scribbles: fol. 1rv.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Undecorated quire marks are written twice (partly faded) in the left upper and lower corner of the first and last folio of quires III to XV on fols. 12r/19v: ፪; 20r/27v: ፫; 28r/35v: ፬; 36r/43v: ፭; 44r/51v: ፮; 52r/59v: ፯; 60r/67v: ፰; 68r/75v: ፱; 76r/83v: ፲; 84r/91v: ፲፩; 92r/99v: ፲፪; 100r/107v: ፲፫; 108r: ፲፬.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the feasts and other occasions written in the upper margin, in the same hand that wrote Additio 2: ዘአቡነ፡ ሳሙኤል: fol. 18ra ዘልደት: fol. 47ra ዘልደት: fol. 48vb በነሐሴ፡ ፳ወ፫: fol. 85vb ዘይትነበብ፡ በበእኁድ፡ ሰንበት: fol. 86va ዘደብረ፡ ምጥማቅ: fol. 107rb በበዓለ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ምንባብ: fol. 114vb ምንባብ፡ ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 117ra ምንባብ፡ በሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን: fol. 118rb ምንባብ፡ በፍልሰታ: fol. 120va ዝኒ፡ ዘፍልሰታ: fol. 122va ምንባብ፡ በቍስቋም: fol. 125ra ዝኒ፡ ዘቍስቋም: fol. 125va ምንባብ፡ በጽዮን: fol. 127va ምንባብ፡ በቍጽረታ: fol. 128vb ምንባብ፡ በልደታ: fol. 129va ምንባብ፡ በቅዳሴ፡ ቤታ: fol. 131ra ምንባብ፡ በስቅለት: fol. 132ra.
